title: Equipment and Utensil Cleaning and Sanitization
content:
Equipment and Utensil Cleaning and Sanitization

State Regulations
§ 14-5.110 - All equipment at vending locations to be kept clean
§ 14-5.111 - Manual facilities
§ 14-5.112 - Definition of sanitization; general requirements
§ 14-5.113 - Drying
§ 14-5.114 - Wiping cloths
§ 14-5.115 - Microwave ovens
§ 14-5.116 - Cleaning record

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
